test.doc: Create new account Add two different items to shopping cart Validate total amount is under 100 USD

suite.doc: This suite contains all tests necessary to buy a single item a) Access web site: http://automationpractice.com/index.php b) Create a new account c) Log in using new account created d) From category Dresses select Summer Dresses e) Add to shopping cart: 2 pieces from second displayed item first item: size S, white color - second item : size L, yellow color f) Add to shopping cart: 2 pieces from third displayed item first item: size M, green color - second item : size L, yellow color g) Access shipping cart and verify that total amount is under 100$ h) Submit/Finalize order User.......: tqmtlzci@oisnjaxw.com Password...: aqlnlgkmdr
